website_summaries.verdict: With an easy-to-use buckle, these cuffs go on and come off without any problem.
pros: These fit around your ankles, wrists, upper arms, calves, and as a belt on a waist up to 54 inches around
The cuffs can be opened to remove some of the foam, thus reducing the buoyancy and allowing you to adjust the resistance
cons: Light to medium resistance in the water
There is not any high resistance to them

customer_reviews.title: Great equipment!
customer_reviews.text: Im a water fitness instructor and I go to conference with AEA and we try all kind of equipment to use in the water. I have the opportunity to try the cuff and they work great. I have clients that they can use it as a water belt; put it on the arms, ankles, just depend what kind of exercises you wanna work with. The good thing is you can open the cuff and take away one of the foams to make it little bit less buoyant. Material quality is good.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Aqua Cuff are great for stretching
customer_reviews.text: In the water, Aqua cuffs are great tool to facilitate stretching, and flexibility. I have had two knee replacements and these help me keep a good bend at knees, as well as, overall muscle stretching and strengthening. They are also wonderful for resistance when water walking... but pay attention, and keep your legs under you when you get over your head otherwise they will flip you up like a buoy. I won't be living without these for the years to come as they help me walk and feel great.
customer_reviews.author: Chaplain sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Secure Flotation
customer_reviews.text: I had good results using this item provided by my fitness center. I purchased a set for my own for deep water flotation exercise. The snap buckles were suitable for my purpose. However, the model that secures the cuff with only a velcro strap may be more convenient for some.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Nolls

customer_reviews.title: deep water aerobics
customer_reviews.text: these are my 3d pair work very well for my hydrofit class keeps the legs in shape and the knees working
customer_reviews.author: Helen Brennan

customer_reviews.title: Worth the cost!!
customer_reviews.text: These quality float cuffs shine far above less expensive models. Fabric over foam with adjustable straps that hold cuffs where you want them are a must for frequent swimmers whom demand quality products,
customer_reviews.author: C. M. Cann

customer_reviews.title: Few people know what it is or the benefits derived from it. Better marketing to the public.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, fits well and is easily adjustable. I use it 5 to 10 hours per week for deep water aerobics and for cardio workout.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good resistance
customer_reviews.text: The cuffs fit ok, they're a bit bulky, slightly abrasive on my ankles.. that's why I gave it 4 stars..
customer_reviews.author: Nona

customer_reviews.title: Are you up for a challenge!!!
customer_reviews.text: These water cuffs are very challenging. Start slow and carefully. You will be amazed the progress you will notice. Worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Aqua cuffs! I plan on getting more some day.
customer_reviews.author: gennie mulqueen

customer_reviews.title: Great cuffs
customer_reviews.text: Love working out with these cuffs - good quality & perfect for water aerobics in the deep end of water
customer_reviews.author: SB

product_meta.title: Hydro-Fit Classic Cuffs O/S Blue/Black
product_meta.description: So unique, they're patented. Classic Cuffs are the hardest working gear we make. Versatile and durable, Cuffs enhance the natural buoyancy and resistance of water, getting you the most out of your time in the water. On your ankles, around your waist, on your arms or on your wrists, Cuffs do it all in both the deep and shallow water.Our Classic Cuffs feature a quick-release buckle closure for an extra firm fit. Classic Cuffs are the preferred choice if you work out aggressively in the water. When wearing as a belt, this item will fit up to a 54" waist.
